text: zbMATH Open, once called Zentralblatt MATH, is a big review service. It gives reviews and short summaries for articles about pure and applied mathematics. It is made by the Berlin office of FIZ Karlsruhe – Leibniz Institute for Information Infrastructure GmbH. The editors are the European Mathematical Society, FIZ Karlsruhe, and the Heidelberg Academy of Sciences. Springer Science+Business Media shares zbMATH.
